Sandy's Green Bean Casserole Recipe

Sandy's Green Bean Casserole

From grumpymomma 1 month ago
  • Add yours
Browse...
Upload Photo or cancel
  • 30 to make
  • Serves 3

My sister made this couple days ago and invited me over for supper. I thought it turned out pretty good. I got my sister's approval to share this. My sister didn't have french fried onions and use cheese since my sister was out of french fried onions. Read more My sister has been struggling financially and it's unable to buy a lot of food since my sister's been struggling. See less

    • 1 to 1 1/2 pounds ground beef
    • 1 small or medium onion, diced

    • 1 can green beans, drain juice
    • 1 can cream of mushroom
    • 1 package french fried onions
    go view your shopping list

Ingredients

  • 1 to 1 1/2 pounds ground beef shopping list
  • 1 small or medium onion, diced shopping list
  • Salt and pepper shopping list
  • 1 package taco seasoning shopping list
  • 1 can green beans, drain juice shopping list
  • 1 can cream of mushroom shopping list
  • 1 package french fried onions shopping list

How to make it

  • 1.Preheat oven to 350° F.
  • 2.Brown the ground beef, onion, season with salt and pepper. Drain the excess fat. Add the taco seasoning and mix well. Add the can of green beans and cream of mushroom soup. Mix well. Pour into an casserole dish. Add the french fried onions. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes
